title: Formation and Process of Fossils: Mobile-Based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental earth science concepts (sedimentary rocks, strata, etc.)
context.additional_context: Modular content accessible via smartphones, with recommendations for utilizing daily learning time

learning_goals: Students can explain three or more biological and environmental factors influencing the fossilization process.
Students can perform variable manipulation experiments at least three times using a virtual fossil creation simulation tool.
Students can establish and present hypotheses for reconstructing paleo-ecosystems through fossil record analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
